title: Policy Version Duration
description: Information on when a specific version of a policy was in effect

start.description: The first day on which this version of the policy was in effect

end.description: The last day on which this version of the policy was in effect

ended.description: Whether or not this version of the policy is still in effect. This can be used as an alternative to `end` when a specific end date is not known

on.description: One or more dates on which this version of the policy was in effect. This can be used to provide supplementary information if either `start` and `end` is unknown, i.e. we don't have a fully defined timeframe

allOf.$comment: We need some information so at least one property must be present
If you have the `end` date, you don't need `ended` to tell you the policy is no longer in effect
If both `start` and `end` are present, i.e. you have a fully defined timeframe, `on` is unnecessary
